system.effect: If the target is not wearing armour on this location, he suffers 1 level of Fatigue from a painful laceration. If he is wearing armour, there is no effect, and he thanks the Emperor for his foresight.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Body (Severity 1)

If the target is not wearing armour on this location, he suffers 1 level of Fatigue from a painful laceration. If he is wearing armour, there is no effect, and he thanks the Emperor for his foresight.
